title: Bain Capital Buys Medical-Device Parts Business
sub_head: The private-equity firm is acquiring an equipment parts company serving hospitals at a $1.25 billion valuation
body:
Bain Capital is buying medical-equipment parts and services company PartsSource Inc. from private-equity firm Great Hill Partners in a deal that values the company at about $1.25 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.
PartsSource’s website connects customers, such as hospitals and medical clinics, with vendors and repair professionals to find replacement equipment, parts and services.
